1.text: Sprinkle baking soda onto the carpet.

2.vid: /e/ef/Get Rid of Wet Carpet Smell Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Use a commercial carpet shampoo if the smell persists.

4.text: Spray on a vinegar solution to kill mold.

5.text: Mix 3% hydrogen peroxide with a dye-free soap for use in a carpet machine.
5.vid: /8/80/Get Rid of Wet Carpet Smell Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Combine 3% hydrogen peroxide and vinegar to clean the carpet by hand.
6.vid: /a/a2/Get Rid of Wet Carpet Smell Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Test the cleaner on an inconspicuous spot.

9.text: Place open boxes of baking soda in humid rooms.

10.text: Consult professional carpet cleaners if necessary.

11.text: Remove the carpet for cleaning if possible.
11.vid: /7/79/Get Rid of Wet Carpet Smell Step 11.360p.mp4
